name: HATHASPACE Smart Air Purifiers - True HEPA Air Purifier, Cleaner & Filter for Allergies, Smoke, Pets - Eliminator of 99.9% of Dust, Pet Hair, Odors - HSP003 - 2800 Sq. Ft.

other_info.Specification Met: Energy Star Certified, ETL Certified, CARB Certified

about_this_item: COMMERCIAL & LARGE SPACE SMART FILTER: Our 3-in-1 filter system targets pollen, dust, pet dander, VOC’s, smoke, and odors - the H13 HEPA filter captures 99.9% of particles down to 0.3 microns. Our lightweight device is portable, allowing you to improve air quality wherever you need it. Our smart air quality sensor & touch-screen display makes the purifier easy to use & adjust your settings, & also shows air quality information.

EXCEPTIONALLY SILENT: Designed for quiet operation, making it perfect for use in bedrooms and living rooms. The purifier's efficiency in capturing dust and particles - see just how much our air purifiers for home can assist and support the body’s natural response

EASY TO USE & INSTALLATION: Built to easily identify, access, and change your filters - our purifier comes with multiple fan speed options, enabling you to set the pace of air filtration to suit your needs. Included is a remote to easily adjust the speed to your preference and turn the light on & off when needed - with the auto mode as well to facilitate real-time adjustments based on your room's air quality, & ITS QUIET!

REMOVE ODORS, SMOKE, & VOC'S: Both an air cleaner & odor eliminator, our air purifier features a unique honeycomb activated-carbon filter that absorbs odors, smoke, and VOC’s. With a state-of-the-art fan and motor, enjoy clean air delivered quietly and efficiently in your home, bedroom, office, kitchen, basement, dorm, apartment, or living room.

FIND RELIEF: Our purifiers come with a 2-year warranty, award-winning customer support 7 days a week, and the peace of mind with a brand you can trust. You can also find our replacement filters to ensure you have fresh air all year around!

title: Does a great job!
content: I purchased this whole house air purifier from a recommendation from a company that does mold remediation. It definitely purifies the air in my entire house. It is very quiet and very easy to change location if need be. Delivery was quick and I had to be home when it was delivered. I have had other air purifiers but I would rate this one the very best.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on August 20, 2024

title: Verified Purchase
content: First, I want to apologize to my spouse of 30 years and my 3 children.  I apologize for all the unnecessary odors you had to endure and the  pet dander and hair all over your black clothes.  I hope you can find it in your heart to forgive me. I really thought air purifiers were a gimmick like bottled water.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on August 26, 2023

title: I'm Sorry!
content: Well, one night I was feeling a little generous....what the heck, let me spend 400 bucks on the largest air purifier I could find on Amazon. If this doesn't work, I'm kicking it to the curve with all the bottled waters. It was delivered fast...you know...that's how Prime rolls.  But let's not digress.  The box was big, and that's always a good sign. I took it out and put it by the corner window next to a air vent.  It's very nice...like it was made to be right in the corner. I was waiting to immediately smell Spring mountain air with a hint of wild flowers. Nothing like that happened, because that's just plain ridiculous...this is not a commercial.  Well, my daughter got home 6 hours later from school. She is cool because she's 17 and thinks I'm still cool... so that's good.  She asked if I was cleaning the house because it smelled fresh....her word..."crisp."  You know when a teenager uses the word crisp, some seismic event occurred.  Well, I told her it was that thing in the corner that I was still suspicious of.  I took a really deep sniff of the air and it did smell slightly crisp. So I decided to go outside for 20 minutes and do dude stuff....walk around...inspect lawn....walk up and down the driveway for no particular reason, but that's what we do. I opened my wife's car and closed it right back because I'm not cleaning it again.... I reopened her car and cleaned it for the very last time- I swear! I swear too much.  45 minute later,  like SpongeBob, I walked back into the house. Nothingness never smell so sweet!!!!....and CRISP! I went around asking everyone if they could smell the sweet Nothingness? I was a proud husband and father. I saved my family from stale air that is distinctively your home when you get back from the office or a trip away from home...especially if you have pets. No More for us. Guess what I did next? I immediately signed up with the company for filter delivery...you won't catch me not having sweet Nothingness again!
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on August 8, 2024

title: Verified Purchase
content: Will buy another one for my store soon
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024

title: Verified Purchase
content: I have a garage workshop that I spend a lot of my time in.  Keeping the smells from invading the house was a challenge.  I am a smoker. This is the only room in the house that I smoke in.  Prior to installing the Hathaspace I had to keep the door open.  I live in a high humidity area and that presented a problem for my equipment.  This filter allows me to use my climate controls without a problem.  It doesn't remove all odors.  But, it removes them sufficiently to prevent them from invading the house.  I highly recommend this product.

title: Customer support came through, finally.
content: Upon turning on this unit its showing that the air quality in my room is 009 (which is considered excellent, score out of 500) … I’m wheezing, coughing up phlegm, and short of breath in the same room and if this is considered an “excellent” air quality BEFORE running the unit I’m gonna say this is a gimmick. I have only had it running for a half an hour. I saw 17,000 reviews and 4.6 stars and I really thought this purifier was gonna work so I spent $500 to buy it… extremely skeptical given what I’ve seen so far. I will update this review in 24 hours should anything miraculously change.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023

title: Clean air means less stuff in my respiratory system which should not be there!
content: Why doesn't the owners manual explain what the functions are? What do the numbers on the front mean, what do the colors of the ring mean? We had a power outage and when the power came back on there was a purple ring lit up and the numbers were all over the place. What do the numbers even mean? When it got back to normal the numbers go from 9 to 6, they don't mean anything to me because there is nothing in the manual that explains it. We have had it turned on for over a month and we see no difference in our home. The manual mentions a sensor on the back of the machine, what is the sensor for? Does it matter how far from the wall it is? This manual sucks!!
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on May 11, 2023

title: Verified Purchase
content: Like most people I have a constant feeling like my air isn't as clean as it could be.  I have a very small house but I thought it would be worth taking up so much space to have air that feels so much cleaner.  Right after opening it was exactly the size I was imagining but in a small house it will take up quite a bit of floor spaced so keep that in mind.  It looks expensive and feels high quality when you are touching it/moving it around.  The instructions are detailed and easy to follow.  Based on my trial and error method I was able to find a few things that weren't listed in the instructions so while I do think the instructions were easy to follow they weren't complete.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on March 17, 2022

title: Powerful purifier that does what it says
content: I am quite pleased with this dual filtration air purifier. I am using this air purifier in my home, and technically this one air purifier should be able to filter all of the air in my home, although I am using an additional purifier upstairs in my bedroom since I have four dogs my my home.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on February 25, 2022

title: really nice but way too expensive
content: This HATHASPACE purifier is downstairs. The main reason I got this is because it claimed to eliminate odors, and while it focused on odors such as smoke, I was interested to see if it was effective on pet odors. It does do a fantastic job on pet fur, dander, and dust. I have noticed considerably less pet fur floating around the house since I got this. I am also sneezing less as a result of pet dander. Additionally, I have an actual allergy to dust, and I have noticed MUCH less dust on the hard surfaces of my home since getting this air purifier, as well as having much less reactivity to dust, both in terms of how much my lungs react as well as how much skin reaction I have. That’s truly remarkable!
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on February 26, 2022

title: Works great for the intended job
content: As for odor elimination, this air purifier does a pretty good job; I’d give it four stars out of five. I have an elderly dog who is frequently stinking up the downstairs of my house (she isn’t permitted upstairs). I can still smell her stickiness every once in a while now right after she makes a mess or gets an upset stomach and has problems, but the issue isn’t nearly as bad (or potentially embarrassing if I want to have guests over) as it used to be before I got this air purifier. Plus, my elderly dog was my one dog who gave me a lot of problems with her dander, and this purifier filters out the pet dander so well that it’s much, much easier to breathe around her.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on March 4, 2022

title: A really solid air purifier
content: This air purifier is really a great value when you consider how much it does to clean the air in your home. It’s a bigger cost up front, but the power it has in purifying the air is amazing. A+++++, definitely highly recommend, especially if you have serious allergies or medical conditions and you need a powerful purifier to clean the air you breathe.

title: Verified Purchase
content: In addition to the display being nearly burned out, our unit stated making a 'knocking' sound, which is quite annoying, especially given that we're using this in our master bedroom. I contacted Hathaspace about these issues and after a few days of communications and sending them a short video clip and some pictures of what was happening, they said they were sending a whole new unit, which arrived the next day!
